Hero.DESCRIPTION: End-to-end product development — from discovery and MVP to scale. I turn ideas into production-ready software, owning the full technical journey.

WEB.TITLE: Web Applications
WEB.DESCRIPTION: Full-stack web products from architecture to deployment. Dashboards, SaaS platforms, e-commerce — built to scale.

MOBILE.TITLE: Mobile Development
MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Cross-platform iOS and Android apps. From concept to App Store — native performance with shared codebase.

AI.TITLE: AI Integration
AI.DESCRIPTION: Adding intelligence to your product. Custom AI agents, chatbots, document processing, and automation workflows.

BACKEND.TITLE: Backend & Infrastructure
BACKEND.DESCRIPTION: Scalable APIs, databases, and cloud infrastructure. CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and production-ready deployments.

UIUX.TITLE: UI/UX Implementation
UIUX.DESCRIPTION: Turning designs into polished interfaces. Design systems, responsive layouts, animations, and accessibility.

CONSULTING.TITLE: Technical Consulting
CONSULTING.DESCRIPTION: Architecture reviews, performance optimization, and technology decisions. Helping teams ship better software.

Work.LABEL: Selected Projects
Work.DISCLAIMER: Some of my strongest work sits behind NDAs with agencies and clients, so not everything can be shown publicly. The selection below is representative, and the industry experience extends beyond these examples.

INDUSTRIES.TITLE: Industry experience
INDUSTRIES.DESCRIPTION: Across both public and private engagements, I’ve shipped products in these domains:

strive.DESCRIPTION: Personalized learning platform that transforms any topic into a complete course. AI generates structured roadmaps, modules, and interactive lessons, while a built-in tutor guides learners through their journey.

withinly.DESCRIPTION: Mental wellness companion that helps you understand yourself and your relationships. Take personality assessments, chat with an AI that remembers your journey, and receive beautifully crafted psychological insights.

mcr.DESCRIPTION: Mobile app for discovering local hotspots and exclusive perks. Browse curated places, save favorites, and let the randomizer surprise you with your next adventure—all with member-only benefits.

dara.DESCRIPTION: Document creation platform that turns your content into polished, professional PDFs. Choose from beautifully designed templates, customize with ease, and let AI help you write compelling content.

uk-tax.DESCRIPTION: Financial guidance platform helping UK businesses and sole traders keep more of what they earn. Get confidential, jargon-free advice on tax savings, smarter pay strategies, and hidden government benefits—all FCA-compliant.

circle-of-trust.DESCRIPTION: Professional networking app built on trust. Build meaningful connections through circles, get recommendations from people you already trust, and grow your network with confidence on iOS and Android.

pp-platforma.DESCRIPTION: Construction project management system that keeps teams aligned. Track projects from start to finish, manage payments and bonuses, and give every role—from engineers to accountants—exactly the access they need.

Contact.LABEL: Get in Touch
Contact.DESCRIPTION: Have a project in mind or want to discuss an opportunity? I'm always open to new challenges. Drop me a message or reach out directly.
